thread.section_title: W New York - Union Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and service
thread.title_full: Great location and service - Review of W New York - Union Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sharon S
title: Great location and service
text: Perfect place to use as a base to tour the city. They made us feel very welcomed and we loved the "whenever whatever" button on the phone. Always met our needs quickly. Brought us a coffee maker and daily coffee pods. Gave us a credit when there was some trouble with check-in. Close to subway, downtown, soho, and easy to get to uptown and broadway. Would stay there again!
